alert.note: Alert for Beartooth Foothills; Judith Gap; Livingston Area; Melville Foothills; Northern Sweet Grass; Southern Wheatland (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 02 at 10:33AM MST until February 03 at 2:00PM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Bitter Cold Wind Chills. Winds gusts of 50 to 60 mph tonight. Blowing snow. * WHERE...Portions of central and south central Montana. * WHEN...Wind Chills this morning and again overnight 2 PM MST Thursday. Strong gusty winds developing this evening and continuing until 2 PM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Strong crosswinds will make travel difficult on Interstate 90 from Livingston to Big Timber, and along Highway 191 from Big Timber through Judith Gap. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Cold temperatures will combine with gusty winds to bring bitter cold wind chills this morning. Gusty winds will increase tonight, bringing a return of bitter cold wind chills. Strong winds will also loft recent light snow cover causing reduced visibility in blowing snow.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Keep pets indoors as much as possible.

area.areaDesc: Beartooth Foothills; Judith Gap; Livingston Area; Melville Foothills; Northern Sweet Grass; Southern Wheatland
